website_summaries.verdict: Two AV shelves are ideal for those who prefer to keep gaming, video, and audio equipment hooked up for anytime use.
pros: Sturdy steel frame with a wide base for extra stability
Fits both flat and curved screens
Caster wheels deliver smooth maneuverability and lock for stationary use
Telescoping columns make height adjustment a breeze
Triple load tested for complete user confidence
cons: Smaller wheels might encounter some difficulty rolling from tiles onto carpets

customer_reviews.title: Watch YouTube before the build
customer_reviews.text: Look for the Kanto MTM65 Mobile TV Stand Assembly video...it is actually three segments of around 15 minutes each. Right, it's a different brand. Similar enough to give you and idea how it goes and what to look out for. Ours had all the parts needed, and nothing was damaged. A lot of the negative reviews are old/out of date. The build went smoothly here after watching. One thing I did have to redo, I put the brackets on the television a bit too low. Nothing about the stand to fault. We did have to remove the set, reposition the bracket, and rehang. We don't roll this thing around much, though it is fine on wood flooring.
customer_reviews.author: comedy makes me smile

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those with small rooms and bigger tvs
customer_reviews.text: This did arrive later that it was expected, however that has nothing to do with the product. It was easy to assemble and it works perfectly for holding up my 55 inch tv and having a shelf for added storage is a plus. I love the base because it allows for us to easy move it around and to also be able to stick it in a small nook without taking up a bunch of floor space.
customer_reviews.author: Rambling Holly

customer_reviews.title: What I like about it is it's great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: What I like about it is it's great for small spaces. What I don't like is there is many missing parts and defective bolts. The tray under the television can't be put on because of missing pieces. I would like the pieces for the tray so I can attach it to the stand. The leveling is also off. Instructions weren't that clear. Amazon and the seller will not honor the missing parts but Amazon claim it would give me $10.00 for restitution LOL. I'm back Walmart because you have better options for rectifying situations and you follow up on issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: To be honest it is the best choice for curved TV!!!
customer_reviews.text: To be honest it is the best choice for curved TV. It also fits flat TV. Delivery was super fast. Before purchasing i asked some questions to customer service about installing and everything. They were very nice and helped me a lot. In fact installing was very easy, in manual everything is very clear described. It comes with all that you need. Webcam shelf is very useful item for those who has kinect. The cart is very durable, it will work forever. Very happy with it. Recommend!1000 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ganna Zarate

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control!
customer_reviews.text: Product has a good look to it, all works EXCEPT: Very poor documentation on installation, and no Quality Control on holes that were drilled that you use a screwdriver with. They were drilled once only, never removed metal fragments, so I can't get them to work without stripping the screw. This required me to use my own equipmet to clean them first. Also, screws, washers etc, were labeled under the wrong numbers. "Quality Control" If I had beed filmed, I think I would have a few hits on utube with this one..
customer_reviews.author: Pam Poirier

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV Stand!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Very sturdy. The wheels are a bit small for rolling on carpet or over a transition strip. It's well balanced, but if the wheels catch on something, you'd better be pulling from down low on the tray, rather than on the TV as it can topple over if you're pushing too hard/fast. It is really nice to be able to move the TV around to different rooms or even on the porch. Definitely, recommend. if you're going to be pushing it on a deck or uneven surface, you might want to purchase some larger 4-inch wheels, the 2-inch wheels that come with this model are easily stuck in tile grout joints or other rough surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Okie Six

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Easy to Manuver
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for an TV on our patio. We have a long, narrow patio without a wall across from our seating. The TV is on the cart and we move it from our workshop off the patio whenever we want to use it. It is so easy. Really like the locking wheels to keep it stabilized. We were able to mount an outdoor antenna to the top. The first shelf has our soundbar. We also were able to hide the wires and cables through the vertical poles! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: karen hardin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: A perfect TV stand. The stand was delivered in perfect condition, with all parts in the box. Not only were all the necessary parts included, but they were individually wrapped and labeled according to the assembly instructions. The stand itself is sturdy, made of heavy gauge steel, with solid welds and appropriately sturdy assemblers (screws, nuts, etc.). The company went to the trouble of having their instructions expertly translated into English (a rarity among "some assembly required" equipment). It's an outstanding stand in every respect. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bif Bechenschnifter

customer_reviews.title: Best TV Stand!
customer_reviews.text: This TV stand is worth every penny. Very sturdy! Shelves are large and wide enough to hold your DVD, XBOX, PlayStation etc... you have another top shelf where you can place a small cable box. Wheels are smooth with stoppers. Love the way the TV looks on the stand. You can position the TV stand any way you want. You do need two people to put this stand together. It does take time to put together. Bought this for my sons room. He really Loves it. Highly recommend this product to anyone who’s looking for something different and sturdy. Looks great in any room!
customer_reviews.author: Lesley

customer_reviews.title: Give yourself extra time, but nice stand!
customer_reviews.text: Out a 65” Samsung plasma on this for our basement workout area. All speaker bars, cable boxes and other items fit on the adjustable shelving. But beware, tye instructions are USELESS and they are common for like three other models. You also can’t really use the internal cable routing because it’s just a shade too right. Good looking and solid though! Rolls around easily and locks well
customer_reviews.author: Jabrony

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product Poor Instructions
customer_reviews.text: Excellent reviews so bought. It’s a superior and strong product. The directions are poor. No washers for the largest sized TV brackets.
customer_reviews.author: MagnusDunning

customer_reviews.title: A terrific stand!
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately I had the thought to buy a stand vs mounting on wall, I researched and found some glass, wood etc, all that didnt give me the sturdiness, height and flexibility. Then I found Onkron. Adjustable heiight, extremely sturdy, and on wheels! I assembled and conected my 65in Samsung and its wonderful. Sleek sharp and showcases TV. I had a small issue with a part and cust services was very responsive and made it right by shipping a replacement part immediately. Now on sturdy wheels, I can bring the tv to different rooms and enjoy everywhere. TY ONKron. Buy this one!
customer_reviews.author: Capn Cook

customer_reviews.title: GET THIS ONE!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about which stand to go with but after putting this together and mounting my tv to it and all the other crap I wanted on it....I could NOT have asked for a better stand. This thing is strong, very well built, easy to put together, easy to move, looks great,.....etc. Now I have a tv that I can move from the guest bedroom to the outside porch next to the pool easily! You can lock the wheels so it doesn’t move. I have a 60” Samsung on there and I can shake the stand I’m not worried about it tipping over. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Already having issues with first part... which are the wheels
customer_reviews.text: Three wheels went in easily, one of the wheels didnt... spent hours trying to get it in and it will not. Waste of time and money.. cant even get past the first part which is putting on wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Strong stand, good room for all needs, and easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.text: This stand is great for what I was looking for. I have my new large 32" LG QHD monitor, my MacBook Pro, my separate HD camera, my keyboard, and my Bluetooth speaker and trackball, all in one place "ready to roll" and still with some available room for a few extra things. I use a trackball instead of a regular mouse to avoid needing a surface for the mouse. It was pretty easy to assemble. It was a bit heavy, so maybe you want to have someone to help you assemble it. I recommend this stand.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Assembly instructions that are fool proof.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this stand because it looked sturdy enough to safely use in my classroom. It is that. Well constructed, heavy and sturdy enough to hold my TV without any concern that someone is going to bump into it and knock it over. A most pleasant surprise and bonus were the step-by-step directions on how to assemble it. They were actually easy to understand and they worked. This is a first for me as I typically assemble things upside down or inside out. No negatives. A much better product than anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: DENNIS DUDA

customer_reviews.title: I have been cheated ... missing parts
customer_reviews.text: When I unpacked the box and took an inventory of the parts I found 2 half circle brackets were missing. This is very disappointing as I cannot attach the tray to the stand.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia C Wong

customer_reviews.title: Great Tv Stand
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good tv stand, I will start by saying that I was missing a few pieces but was able to replace them easily with local parts, but other than that the assembly is pretty simple even though mine did not include the instructions. We have a 60” tv on the stand and it is held it perfectly, no real worry about it falling or collapsing because of the weight, the one thing I wish was included was some way to tilt the tv but other than the lack of some of the components not being shipped I have been impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob M

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy stand that was just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy stand with the ability to lock all 4 wheels. It was easy to assemble and appears to have a few improvements/changes since the directions were written--but not really an issue (Like safety bolts that secure the height adjustment to prevent accidental changes.) The wheels are large enough to allow the stand to be rolled around on moderately plush carpet. The lower shelf is plastic but it is very sturdy, more than enough for a DVD player or laptop.
customer_reviews.author: W. Ellsworth

customer_reviews.title: Almost Great
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, I love this stand and it's perfect around the office. Only complaint is one of the bolt holes for the wheels was painted over and I had to get our maintenance guy to tap the threads to get the wheel on. Other than that, our 65" TV works great on this stand.
customer_reviews.author: Super Mo

customer_reviews.title: Great TV stand
customer_reviews.text: This stand is great, especially for the cost. Some of the reviews on this product had me nervous but I am glad I pulled the trigger. Product was easy to assemble and feels very sturdy. I've had it outside multiple times in heavy wind and it did not move at all or even wobble. Some reviews said the wheels were cheap but I had no issues. Maybe they got a bad set? Either way, I really enjoy this stand and it is definitely worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Hard pass
customer_reviews.text: 1 out 4 tv stand bolts didn’t line up for install. The mounting bolts to the TV we’re wrong sizes “Samsung 50” UHD” and the when attached to the stand the TV is tilted upwards. Never buying this garbage ever again
customer_reviews.author: Choekas

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Mobile Cart for your Big Screen TV
customer_reviews.text: It took a while to put the cart together, but it's sturdy and stable. There are 2 small shelves to hold a laptop computer or DVD player. You can mount up to a 60 inch TV - mine is 55 inches. The cart rolls smoothly, and the wheels lock with the touch of your foot. One caution: Not of the hardware is named in the instruction book, so it takes some thought and guesswork. Assembly is with a hex wrench that's included.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID W BROWN

customer_reviews.title: Missing Hardware
customer_reviews.text: It's ok, if you don't need the hardware to put it together. I received mine with no hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for New TV
customer_reviews.text: We upgraded to a new LG OLED 65 inch TV and wanted it on a stand. Most cabinet choices were either too low and or just fiberboard and looked cheap. The ONKRON was highly rated and it fit the bill for us 100%. A simple but secure and strong stand for our new TV. It arrived just as promised to the door -thanks Amazon. Was simple to assemble .We accidentally misplaced one small securing tab and needed a replacement. ONKRON online Customer Service Chat was available on Saturday and sent me replacement clip that arrived the next week. VERY happy with the purchase.Stand has locking wheels to secure it and looks GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: Narraboth

customer_reviews.title: Second one - happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Repeat buyer, except this time I got the 2-shelf version. I ordered the white but got the black - no problem, fits my decor better. Very sturdy and easy to put together. Comes with extra mounting parts/screws for all kinds of VESA sizes and such. Could hold a pretty heavy TV, honestly. I wheel mine around the living room to put in front of the treadmill or the couch or wherever I need. Quality product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Locodarwin

customer_reviews.title: Very solid and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Great solution to my design problem. I was able to save my closet and my bookcase and maintain all my storage without having to sacrifice any storage, just roll tv out of the way to access my bookcase or pantry /closet
customer_reviews.author: RB@yahoo

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: This TV stand is high quality, has great support for my 60" flat TV. It took about 10-15 min to assemble (instruction is decent), and another 15 min to mount the TV--did on my own but not recommended :) I searched for hours and hours and read so many reviews before ordering it, and I'm not disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazoniac

customer_reviews.title: Starting to rust after just 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this TV stand. We purchased it in November and it’s already rusty in a few different spots and looks terrible. Something that’s obviously made for the outdoors shouldn’t rust after justs 6 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Babineau

customer_reviews.title: TV tilt backward at top edge
customer_reviews.text: After mounted, the TV is tilted backward st the top. We need to add materials on top mounts to compensate a bit, still not vertical. It appears the vertical poles are leaning backward slightly, which caused the TV to tilt. Should have adjustment for that manufacturing variance.
customer_reviews.author: SST

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Mobile
customer_reviews.text: Very solid and high quality stand. I was worried because the postal service destroyed the packaging when opening and repackaging, but all of the pieces were intact upon arrival. There are other brands for this exact model that wouldn't ship overseas, so I got lucky finding the same product (different name) that would ship to my address.
customer_reviews.author: Stevoo

customer_reviews.title: Superior tv stand!
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with this tv stand, had some trouble attaching the shelf, but take your time, instructions are pretty simple, and hardware is well organised in marked bags. Looks good, and most importantly is super strong and stable, I have it in my concrete floored art studio, and it’s super secure and maneuverable. Would definitely recommend or buy again, especially so you can get your video gaming closer to your sofa!
customer_reviews.author: S. J. Whalley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The company that sold the item shipped an item that was defective and was very hard to assemble as the bolt holes had welds inside and some pieces were broken
customer_reviews.author: James gish

customer_reviews.title: extremely well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Impressively strong construction. Far from being a "let's see how cheaply we can make this" light consumer grade product. The only suggestion I have is that they make the wheel plastic a little harder. Some have indents that make it thump as you roll it across the room. Not a big deal though.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Mounting frame blocks many ports and plugs on medium sized HDTV's :(
customer_reviews.text: It is a sturdy unit, but you'll have to budget in buying 90-degree power/video cables because the mounting plate the tv mounts to blocks most if not all of the ports and plugs on my Samsung. Do your research otherwise, you'll be ordering cables and messing around trying to get things to plugin.
customer_reviews.author: Stampede

customer_reviews.title: pretty solid
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit more expensive than similar size tv stands, but it feels more stable and solid. Also having those 3 additional shelves (2 large ones and 1 small on top) is great. Assembly was easy, no problem. In my case I had 2 plastic caps cracked when it arrived (shipping damage), but they responded and replaced them very quick, so no problem here.
customer_reviews.author: Volodymyr Derhachov

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and functional TV Stand
customer_reviews.text: Well made and sturdy enough to hold my 65" Samsung LED TV securely. Assembly can be done by one , but its easier with two. Instructions are clear and worked well as reference, parts were all identifiable and packed well. Overall would recommend and consider purchasing again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: P. Catchpole

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight but sturdy. Love the fact that I can hide the cables in the back part. I don't like exposed cables. Wheels work great. I move it every week for our church down several hallways. I have a 55" TV mounted on mine. Would be great if it came with some additional length screws for the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Mears

customer_reviews.title: This tv stand has improved my quality of life!
customer_reviews.text: I don't often make a purchase that I'm thrilled with but this time I'm so pleased!!! I'm elderly with physical limitations and often spend a lot of time in bed. When bedridden I watch a lot of TV and this stand makes it possible to be so much more comfortable. I can see from just about any position. Purchasing this stand has been life changing for me! I absolutely love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JackieLooney

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Item and beautifully designed
customer_reviews.text: Saw this item on "Madam Secretary" in a couple oval office scenes and had to have one. The item very sturdy and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: OLC

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy TV stand
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure on the sturdiness of the product especially at the price point but I was pleasantly surprised. Very well made and designed. The stand replaced a bulky table I was using as a TV stand and catch-all. Glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mrjrm63

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cart
customer_reviews.text: This cart is amazing. I wanted a trade-show quality display holder and I got it. It’s easy to assemble, solid, and very adjustable. The wheels are silent and smooth and it’s heavy enough that you don’t have to fear tipping. It’s one of my favorite purchases this year and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne

customer_reviews.title: The product is very stable and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: The price is right. The service was fast. The product is very stable and easy to put together. No problems. I recommend to anyone who needs a portable tv stand.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Well Built TV Stand - Definitely Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to hold an older 48” flatscreen (circa 2013) that I’ll use as a mobile monitor in my art studio. The tv was pretty heavy in comparison to the newer, slimmer models but this stand worked like a charm. Only critiques would be the installation instructions. Not very intuitive but if you’re handy and used to putting things like this together, you’ll figure it out using the instructions a simple guide. VERY STURDY, not a bit of wiggle which is great but this is NOT easily adjustable with regard to height.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome choice for tv used a monitor
customer_reviews.text: i originally wanted to wall mount a 55 inch lg oled tv on the wall to use with my computer setup but then i saw this while browsing. The cart is way better idea. I have my tv at eye level and use a ups for power to unplug it an move it around the house to use for other functions. I also have a 15 4k hdmi cable i can connect to my pc as needed. Stand is solid, tv is well mounted and the back wire management is good enough. Would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Space saver! Sleek!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition and on time, it says it’s a two person job and it definitely is. I was able to knock it out in 2 hours by myself with the help of my dinning table! It’s sturdy and rolls great on the floor. It holds my Vizio 50 inch to perfection!
customer_reviews.author: Coalton Miller

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Cart
customer_reviews.text: Great cart. Easy to put together. Have a 65" LG mounted on it, with soundbar on top and sub on bottom shelf, and a spare shelf for a PS4/Xbox1. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I assembled this stand in about an hour. Easy assembly instructions. This stand moves easily over the carpet. We're using it with a 43" TV so I really didn't expect any difficulty with mobility.. We did have to use a smaller, than supplied, Allen driver on a couple of the screws. The plastic shelves seem sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: JBennet

customer_reviews.title: Bad design.
customer_reviews.text: 55 inch tcl would barely fit on it. No adjustments. Took much longer to install than should have. Locking system was very bad design. I hope I do not have to take this TV off this stand ever.
customer_reviews.author: Rick C.

customer_reviews.title: I really like this stand
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stand, however I ran into a little issue when putting it together. The directions for installing the tray that sits in the front was extremely complicated, you would think that would be the easy part, but obviously they were explained a bit wrong (don't let that stop you from buying it, just take your time putting it together.) Nevertheless, great stand, fast shipping and makes my 55" Sony 4K TV look even better.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Baker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent TV Cart
customer_reviews.text: This TV cart was extremely easy to put together, the hardest part was attaching the shelves. It feels very sturdy and is easy to roll it around. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: azorr

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Not too hard to put together, and it is very stable and strong. Only hard part was lifting the TV up onto it. Definitely would suggest a two-person lift for that part, but otherwise one person to put it together is a piece of cake.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I luv my stand!!! Best thing I ever bought from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, practical, well-designed TV stand
customer_reviews.text: This requires some skill and strength to assemble, but it is well worth the effort. This is a very sturdy, well-designed flat-screen TV and computer monitor stand. I am very satisfied and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: AutoMatters and More

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: Missing several parts to be properly put together. Certain screws and metal plates
customer_reviews.author: Sara Sandburg

customer_reviews.title: Great stand for offices
customer_reviews.text: Very good stand, only complaint is the screws for the tv were causing the tv to not sit flat, it faced up. I went down to home depot and got a little bit longer screws and it worked perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G

customer_reviews.title: Assembly issue
customer_reviews.text: Im only posting this review to make known the issue I had. One of the caster holes had a big weld where the threads are. I had to drill out the excess weld and run a tap through to get the wheel to thread in. Quality issue i guess, but hopefully mine was an anomoly. Just a warning. Otherwise it seems to be a pretty decent product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great unit but the supports linit connector accessability.
customer_reviews.text: On a larger LG TV, the stand supports cover the inputs for the TV making connections for additional speakers or HDMI corded devices difficult at best. Either buy short adapters and place in th edevice inputs needed before attaching to th estand.
customer_reviews.author: RTL

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This stand has been great! It was super easy to put together. We have a 42 inch television on it and it works fine. We are thinking of upgrading to a larger tv because this stand is so sturdy. My son looked it over and decided to buy one himself. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Carkur

customer_reviews.title: Good product, horrible assembly manual
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, sturdy stand for my plasma tv. My only criticism was the poor assembly instruction manual. Don’t get me wrong, it wasn’t hard to put together, but the instructions were horrible. Why can’t companies in China spend a few bucks and have someone with half a brain write these?
customer_reviews.author: S. sanders

customer_reviews.title: Good TV stand
customer_reviews.text: Not hard to assembly. Took one hour for two of us to put it together. Great for a corner TV. The only thing is the legs stick out too long. I guess it’s safety issue.
customer_reviews.author: Katt

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised -- Good Product
customer_reviews.text: A solid stand, works perfectly with my 55" NEC tv. Easy to put together, even for me. That says a lot.
customer_reviews.author: callum j valleli

customer_reviews.title: Good Stand
customer_reviews.text: We have a 65" TV mounted on it fine. The shelves are great for storing items. It would get 5-starts if it had bigger caster wheels. They're fine for wheeling around a room, but you can have trouble transitioning surfaces like if it has to move around a building via elevator.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse K

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: So, I bought this used from Amazon. Other than a couple of missing bolts and a rather beat-up box (upon arrival) it works well. Even with the missing parts, it was worth the savings.
customer_reviews.author: Myron

customer_reviews.title: Strong and sturdy TV stand
customer_reviews.text: Assembly for this tv stand takes two people and lots of patience. But it’s worth the effort. Our stand is holding a 55” tv, and it is solid. It also moves effortlessly. It is exactly what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Was not able to have the tv mounted on the wall so we searched for an alternative. This stand was easy to assemble and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Built like a tank.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is built like a tank. Wheels are super quality. All steel. Won’t tip over if your not a using it for a tackle. As a mechanic I’d say awesome. Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Ruff jr

customer_reviews.title: Horrible build instructions
customer_reviews.text: Pro's - it went together. It is, in fact, sturdy. There are two shelves. Cons - it took way, way to long to achieve the 'pro' state.
customer_reviews.author: Lego Man

customer_reviews.title: used item missing any parts
customer_reviews.text: it should’ve been clearly stated that this used item was missing many parts for instants purchased this specifically with two shelves which one was missing etc. this was truly not fair I would’ve bought new if I have been informed Also very hard to put together
customer_reviews.author: Helen Theis

customer_reviews.title: Solid Value
customer_reviews.text: Holds my 32" TY well and is easy to maneuver around. Took a bit of effort to assemble with a couple unclear directions in one section.
customer_reviews.author: GAM

customer_reviews.title: Great stand!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for gaming, Love it! sturdy and well designed. The TV was a little too high on the lowest setting so I let it drop all the way down and its now perfect. Rolls great on carpet too. Def would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Luis B.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this and wish I had bought it way sooner considering all the holes I’ve put into walls when this eliminated the need for that entirely!
customer_reviews.author: Confidential87

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Missing an important parts
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed..I received this product a week earlier than expected but the box was in very poor condition. I started setting up the base and realized that I am missing one of the mounts for the shelves. This is a huge bummer because without the second shelf I can’t really set up my entertainment equipment. At this point It’s $150 worth of useless metal sitting in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Very stable
customer_reviews.text: Great stand. Put a 60” screen on it and feels very stable even rolling over carpet in my house
customer_reviews.author: T. R. Quigley

customer_reviews.title: GREAT !
customer_reviews.text: This TV Stand is awesome. It is exactly as described. VERY EASY TO SET UP. Has different positions. The trays hold PC's or the firestick, remotes. keyboards Sturdy too
customer_reviews.author: Slc

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavy duty stand
customer_reviews.text: We love this TV stand. As matter fact, I am ordering a second one today.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Wooldridge

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This stand would have been awesome but it leaned forward once it was put together!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is such an awesome stand. Some what tricky to assemble. Once assembled, and tv on it....AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.author: Helena

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what it was supposed to be!
customer_reviews.text: We could have bought a less expensive stand but wanted the height this one is capable of and the added sturdiness this stand offers.
customer_reviews.author: B VapeGuru

customer_reviews.title: Fit my 70”LG
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a 70” LG tv. Works well even though it should max out at a 65”. Just have to be a little careful when moving.
customer_reviews.author: William L Runion

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this for our downstairs. We have a somewhat open floor plan, and I enjoy the fact that I can watch tv in several different places. With 5 kids I was afraid the tv would get knocked down or damaged, but no worries. This stand is incredibly sturdy and I’m not worried at all!
customer_reviews.author: Kori

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the stand. Easy to put together very solid construction. I bought for the height but may actually move the tv from room to room. Nothing broken or missing from the carton.
customer_reviews.author: thomas p.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I like the stand so far, it's stable and easy to move around. Quality matches the price. I had the minor issue with one of the shelf holders, which was slightly bent, but manufacturer resolved it quickly by sending me the replacement parts. Thanks for the prompt response, appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: Frolov Y.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product. We have it on a screened in porch.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully designed all steel tv cart is a definite "yes." Very steady. Casters lock easily.
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully designed all steel tv cart is a definite "yes." Very steady. Casters lock easily. Packed well, arrived on time. As described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution
customer_reviews.text: Mounted our 42" Sony to it to wheel to the back porch or guest rooms for viewing. Works great! Very solid construction.
customer_reviews.author: MudFlap

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV Stand!
customer_reviews.text: We love this stand! It looks great and is functional. Was easy to assemble. We highly recommend this stand :)
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Terrible instructions, holes drilled in wrong place
customer_reviews.text: The directions and illustrations are maybe the worst I’ve ever seen. Also,the holes in the upright are not drilled properly so they don’t match up to the connecting part. I’m sure this will be a good stand if I ever get it assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Ellis Bellwood

customer_reviews.title: Excellent option for outdoor tv!
customer_reviews.text: This stand works perfectly for watching tv on our patio. It is very well made....... Sturdy and easy to move around. It is exactly what I was looking for. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: The ultimate TV stand !
customer_reviews.text: This stand is outstanding!!! Sturdy, well built, stable and heavy duty !! Especially if you have a large and heavy TV screen. Great also for outdoor use! High quality craftsmanship!! Highly recommend this product ! The ultimate portable TV stand !!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: best merchandise ever
customer_reviews.text: I'm using my equipment for my 50'' Flat screen and works wonderful, it feel like watching movies or favorite shows from a roll down screen, JUST GREAT. would recommends hands up. also wife likes because no wiring showing from back.
customer_reviews.author: FRANKDP/ALBANY

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Really solid - one of the best on the market in my opinion. Easy to move, adjust, etc.
customer_reviews.author: DaugHaus

customer_reviews.title: What an Authentic Product!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Onkron Mobile Tv Stand is very easy to assemble, authentic and aesthetically pleasing!!!!! Am so impressed with this product!!!!! I recommend it to anyone looking for an elegant Tv stand!
customer_reviews.author: Erick

customer_reviews.title: Good quality cart
customer_reviews.text: Good quality cart. We've purchased other ones for more money and this one is just as good. Perfect for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Steinieswife

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: It was a little difficult to set up and definitely takes two people to do. It is very sturdy and a high quality piece!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Its simple and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Its sturdy and perfect stand. Im very happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: brivera

customer_reviews.title: Great!  Holds a lot of weight.
customer_reviews.text: We put a 70" TV on it and it is still sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Cb

customer_reviews.title: Height adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Love the slim configuration so it fits in a tight spot. Moves around easily on the wheels. Height adjusts if you want a room full of people to be able to see the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and movable.
customer_reviews.text: Used for 55” TV for back enclosed porch. Very sturdy and maneuverable . Instructions for assembly could have been better, but even an 84 year old female did it with help only with last lifting of TV attachment.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and rolls easily
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to setup just needed screwdriver as additional tool. Built is strong and holds TV great.
customer_reviews.author: MLKRR

product_meta.title: ONKRON Mobile TV Stand with Mount Rolling TV Cart for 32” – 65” LCD LED Flat Screen TV with Wheels Shelves Height Adjustable TV Trolley (TS15-51)
feature_bullets: Universal television stand fits most models of LCD LED OLED both flat and curved TVs up to 100 lbs
Television viewing height adjustable from 47.2’’ to 59 inches off the floor in 2 inch increments
Steady metal alloy frame safely holds up to 100 lbs screens, 4 caster wheels allow easy movement
Middle and top shelves for audio video equipment, hide cables in stand poles to keep things neat

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars455 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
